records.name: Nikabliss Dhigurah

descriptions.direction: Located in Dhigurah, Oasis Dhigurah is near the beach. The area's natural beauty can be seen at Ari Atoll and Dhigurah Beach. Bikini Beach is another place to visit that comes recommended. Looking to get your feet wet? Windsurfing and fishing adventures can be found near the property.
descriptions.general: With a stay at Bliss Dhigurah in Dhigurah, you'll be by the ocean, within a 5-minute drive of Ari Atoll and Great Banyan Tree. This beach guesthouse is 0. 1 mi (0. 1 km) from Ibrahim Kalaafaan Mosque and Shrine and 0. 1 mi (0. 1 km) from Harbor Green Zone. Spend the day on the private beach or dip into one of the 2 spa tubs. Additional features at this guesthouse include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and a picnic area. Featured amenities include express check-in, express check-out, and dry cleaning/laundry services. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge at scheduled times. For lunch or dinner, stop by Hermit's, a restaurant that specializes in international cuisine. Dining is also available at the coffee shop/café, and room service (during limited hours) is provided. Make yourself at home in one of the 15 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and flat-screen televisions. Your room comes with a pillowtop bed. Rooms have private balconies. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Private bathrooms with separate bathtubs and showers feature rainfall showerheads and complimentary toiletries.

records.short_description: Excellent accommodation. Close to the beach . Awesome vibe.
